messages.content: There's a shooting, I'm at 1331 Bannister Road. We need help.
Can you confirm the location, 1331 Bannister Road?
Yes, 1331 Bannister Road, there's a shooter.
Is anyone with you? Is anyone injured?
I'm alone, but I've been shot. My right arm is hit, but I'm okay.
We have officers in route to your location. Can you describe the suspect?
White male, in his 50s. He's heading southbound on Lydia. He had another gun as well.
Understood. We are dispatching units. Can you stay hidden and secure?
Yes, and I'm trying, he's dangerous and wanted me to shoot him.
Stay safe. Please avoid any engagement. Help is on the way. Do you have any further information on the vehicle?
Yes, it's a maroon Oldsmobile, 302 Young John Adam.
Thank you. We are relaying this information to all units. Hang in there.
Hurry, he's not going to go down without a fight, might still have another weapon.
Understood. Officers are forming a perimeter and will approach carefully. Stay on the line with us.
